issue.title: Remove / Obsolete usages of ValueBuffer

milestone.title: MQ
milestone.description: This is a "milestone for quality", which means improving things like test coverage, internal code quality, build systems, etc.

repository.name: efcore
repository.description: EF Core is a modern object-database mapper for .NET. It supports LINQ queries, change tracking, updates, and schema migrations.

issue.body:
- [x] `IIdentityMap.Contains`
- [x] `IPrincipalKeyValueFactory<>.CreateFromBuffer`
- [x] `IReadOnlyModificationCommand.PropagateResults`
- [x] #31117
- [ ] JSON key values, see `RelationalShapedQueryCompilingExpressionVisitor.ShaperProcessingExpressionVisitor.cs`
- [ ] `MaterializationContext`
- [ ] https://github.com/dotnet/efcore/issues/21335
- [ ] Look for more places where it can be replaced with `object[]`, `EntityEntry` or a generic type that avoids boxing

issue.title: Change IStateManager.StartTrackingFromQuery to use ISnapshot instead of ValueBuffer

repository.name: efcore
repository.description: EF Core is a modern object-database mapper for .NET. It supports LINQ queries, change tracking, updates, and schema migrations.
